meanings.sent1: The fireworks were blastier than the sparklers.
meanings.sent2: The storm grew blastier as the wind picked up speed.
meanings.sent3: The blastier music made everyone dance with more energy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a blastier version of a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The blastier colors of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.sent1: The blustery day turned even blastier as the clouds darkened.
meanings.sent2: The blizzard became blastier, making it hard to see beyond the snow.
meanings.sent3: The blasty wind turned blastier, causing hats to fly off heads.
meanings.sent4: His blasty temper flared even blastier when he lost the game.
meanings.sent5: The blasty waves crashed against the shore even blastier than before.
